bibl.title: Dispatch from William Walker to John Appleton, April 6, 1859
Despatches from United States Consuls in Gaboon, 1856-1888 T-466

div1.opener:
Rec.11 April. Mr Abbott
Washington, April 6, 1859
Hon. John Appleton
Assistant Sec'y of State
Sir,
div1.p: This is to certify that I, the undersigned; was at the Gaboon West Africa on the arrival of Henry A. Ford M.D. appointed U.S. Counsular Agent for that place, on July 1st, 1856, & that he was at that place the whole time to the date of his death Feb. 3, 1858, attending to sick & distressed seamen and performing the duties of Consular Agent. I was in the Gaboon the whole of that period, & was with him at the time of his death.
div1.closer: Very Respectfully Yours Wm. Walker Missionary of the A.B.C.F.M
